content:
After the next Russian attack on the Dnipropetrovsk region on the field in the Kryvyi Rih district, the combat unit of the controlled aviation missile X-59 was discovered ..

About thisreported on March 28National Police of Ukraine.

With the help of special equipment, it was loaded into a police pickup and taken to the landfill. A dangerous fragment was blown up by the controlled explosion.

Law enforcement officers emphasize citizens: in case of finding any debris, do not come or touch them-immediately report the finding to the police.

AsWriting the Armyinform, in the Dnipropetrovsk region the combat part of "Shahaneda" was neutralized.
title: In the Dnieper, the combat part of the X-59 missile was eliminated
description: The National Police of Ukraine reported this on March 28. With the help of special equipment of her ...
author: Army Inform
